Text:
hi Fresch3000,

fullscreen doesn't work although its set in main menu. Game still runs in a window. Is there a fix?

I'm on snow leopard and don't have a widescreen monitor.

Hmm..

It should work on 4:3 monitors.
Remember that the resolution "1280x1024", in the game, is infact "1920x1280".

The resolution is hacked, but the game still shows the old resolution.

Try applying a lower resolution.
Only the highest in the game is hacked for widescreen.

Try 800x600, apply, quit the game, and the relaunch :)
anybody able to seed? it'd be very much appreciated
